data.text: Nʼchifukwa chiyani mwatitaya ife kwamuyaya, Inu Mulungu?
Kumbukirani anthu amene munawagula kalekale,
Tembenuzani mapazi kuloza ku mabwinja awa amuyaya
Adani anu anabangula pa malo pamene Inu munkakumana nafe;
Iwo anachita ngati anthu oti anyamula mbendera zawo
Kenaka anaphwanya ndi nkhwangwa ndi akasemasema awo
Iwo anatentha malo anu opatulika mpaka kuwagwetsa pansi;
Ndipo anati mʼmitima yawo, “Tawatha kwathunthu.”
Ife sitinapatsidwe chizindikiro chodabwitsa;
Kodi mpaka liti, mdani adzanyoze Inu Mulungu?
Chifukwa chiyani mukubweza dzanja lanu lamanja?
Koma Inu Mulungu, ndinu Mfumu yanga kuyambira kalekale;
Ndinu amene munagawa nyanja ndi mphamvu yanu;
Ndinu amene munaphwanya mitu ya Leviyatani
Ndinu amene munatsekula akasupe ndi mitsinje,
Masana ndi anu ndipo usiku ndi wanunso;
Ndinu amene munakhazikitsa malire onse a dziko lapansi;
Kumbukirani momwe mdani wakunyozerani Inu Yehova,
Musapereke moyo wa nkhunda yanu ku zirombo zakuthengo;
Mukumbukire pangano lanu, pakuti malo obisika a mʼdziko
Musalole kuti osautsidwa abwerere mwamanyazi;
Dzukani Inu Mulungu ndipo dzitetezeni pa mlandu;
Musalekerere phokoso la otsutsana nanu,
